trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for the configuration sections that specify predefined bindings provided by Windows Communication Foundation (WCF).
A standard binding element.
A binding configuration element.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardBindingCollectionElement`2"></xref> class.
Gets all the standard bindings defined in this configuration section.
A collection of all the standard bindings defined in this configuration section.
Gets the type of this binding.
The type of this binding.
Gets a collection of configured bindings objects.
A collection of configured bindings objects.
Determines whether a binding exists in the collection using the specified name.
The name of the binding to be located.
`true` if the collection contains the binding with the specified name; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the default binding used.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding"></xref> object that represents the default binding.

Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.

A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
Adds the specified binding to the collection.
The name of the binding to be added.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding"></xref> object that represents the binding to be added.
The configuration settings of this binding.
`true` if the binding can be added to this collection; otherwise, `false`.
